html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-05632017-06-02TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (Electronic Stability Control Systems for Heavy Vehicles)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (ELECTRONIC STABILITY CONTROL SYSTEMS FOR HEAVY VEHICLES) in order to reduce the occurrence of rollover and loss-of-control crashes by introducing a new safety standard to the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations that would mandate the fitment of Electronic Stability Control systems on certain truck tractors and buses with a gross vehicle weight rating greater than 11,793 kilograms.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0104 Publication Date: 2017-06-14
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (Electronic Stability Control Systems for Heavy Vehicles)
precis: Regulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (ELECTRONIC STABILITY CONTROL SYSTEMS FOR HEAVY VEHICLES) in order to reduce the occurrence of rollover and loss-of-control crashes by introducing a new safety standard to the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations that would mandate the fitment of Electronic Stability Control  systems on certain truck tractors and buses with a gross vehicle weight rating greater than 11,793 kilograms.
